name: A faintly glowing amulet of pumice
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom somewhat.
It increases the users intelligence somewhat.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration astoundingly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users cold resistance a bit.
It increases the users fire resistance a bit.
It gives great bonus to the spell 'incendiary coating'.
Eternal fire burns within the gemstone.
